member.name: T:XLocalizer.Common.ResourceTypeHelper
member.summary:
Generate fully qualified resource name ResourceManager looks for .resources files in the project output directory. So if our resource file is .\LocalizationResources\LocSource.tr.resx Then ResourceManager will look for: SampleProject.LocalizationResources.LocSource.tr.resources
The resource name must be in the following format: {assembly-name}.{resources-folder}.{resource-namespace}.{resource-name} e.g. SampleProject.LocalizationResources.LocSource e.g. SampleProject.LocalizationResources.Pages.Products.IndexModel
The challenge is when we have a type name for a PageModel out of resources-folder, such type has no class inside the resources folder, so we have to reconstruct the type full name to fulfill above format.

member.name: M:XLocalizer.Common.ResourceTypeHelper.CreateCompiledResourceName(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Create the compiled reource name from type and location
member.param: Resources folder path

member.name: M:XLocalizer.Common.ResourceTypeHelper.CreateResourceName(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Create a reource name from type and location
member.param: Resources folder path

member.name: M:XLocalizer.Common.ResourceTypeHelper.GetResourceType(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a type name from basename and location
member.param: Type full name
Assembly name

member.name: T:XLocalizer.ErrorMessages.IdentityErrors
member.summary: Provides all identity describer error messages in one single class. This class is part of XLocalizer members, so it can be overridden in appsettings.json or antother file. Overriding values in appsettings.jso allows to customize the error messages, or to provide default error messages in a different culture other than en

member.name: P:XLocalizer.ErrorMessages.IdentityErrors.DuplicateEmail
member.summary: "Email '{0}' is already taken."

member.name: T:XLocalizer.ErrorMessages.ModelBindingErrors

member.name: T:XLocalizer.XLocalizerOptions

member.summary: The path to the resources folder e.g. "LocalizationResources"

member.name: P:XLocalizer.XLocalizerOptions.UseExpressValidationAttributes
member.summary: Express validation attributes are deprected. Use default attributes instead. See Localizing Data Annotations

member.name: P:XLocalizer.XLocalizerOptions.AutoAddKeys
member.summary: If the key string is not found in the DB, it will be inserted autoamtically to the DB. default: false

member.name: P:XLocalizer.XLocalizerOptions.AutoTranslate
member.summary: If the translation string is not found, it will be translated via registered translation servies. default: false Requires registering of one translation service at least. see Registering Translation Services for Localization

member.name: P:XLocalizer.XLocalizerOptions.UseExpressMemoryCache
member.summary: ExpressMemory cache helps speeding up getting localized values from data stores. It is helpful to set to false during development mode and to true in production. Default value: true.

member.name: P:XLocalizer.XLocalizerOptions.TranslateFromCulture
member.summary: The culture name to translate from, if not set default request culture will be used.
